page.title: 02FULLWOOD FARM
page.content: The present owner of{Fullwood Farm has lived there for over{18 years.}He carries out{mainly arable}work over{20 of his{170 acres,}the remainder of which he rents to a farmer with {charolais cows.}The building and farm are between{100}and{300 years}old.He employs the{equivalent}of{one and a {half men.}He grows{potatoes,barley}and other{corn,}the{barley}being{fed}to the{cows.}He sends the products to {Potato Merchants}and{Grain Compounders {Agricultural Merchants}supply him with his{raw materials.}He uses{four {tractors},a{combine harvestor}and a {car}for transport. The busiest time of year is{Autumn,}when the{grain}is {harvested.}The hours he works are very {flexible.}The{waste}is used to{bed}the {cattle.
